Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Enacts the "Nassau future protectors act"
Summary: Enacts the "Nassau future protectors act" to provide additional credits to the Nassau county law enforcement explorers in competitive civil service examinations; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 6-A ยง89, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to providing additional credits to Nassau county law enforcement explorers
